834100.name: Dungeon Adventure
834100.description:
Dungeon Adventure is a story about a bunch of adventurers trapped in a dungeon. The dark force gets stronger every door they pass. Unfortunately, they have no choice other than moving forward. The only way out for them is through.

Featuring:
- 5 trapped adventurers.
- 20 customizable skills.
- 19 merciless monsters.
- 10 hand-crafted levels (includes more than 100+ fights).

With special appearance of:
- Gems
- Consumables
- Shops
- Crafting
- Frustration or sense of pride and accomplishment (depends on how good you are at the game)
- Bugs
